Export.Routine:
VARINDispenseToPatientLine #include COMSYS #include INConst #include VARConst #include MEDConst #include COMConst #include COMGridEdit31 #include WWWConst Quit LoadDispenses(pidCurDisp,&parrDrugs) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Load Dispensed Drugs ; ; Params: Rx & Array ; ; Returns: Updated array ; ; History: ; 2014-07-16 Henrique Dias HEVA-1348: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- New idxRx,idDisp,idIssueLine,objIssueLine,idIssueItem,dtTo,objRxLine,objDisp,blnDispensed Quit:pidCurDisp="" Set idDisp = pidCurDisp Set idIssueLine = "" Set idparrDrugs = "" Kill ^parrDrugs For { Set idIssueLine = $Order(^INIssueLine(YM,pidCurDisp,idIssueLine)) Quit:idIssueLine="" Set objIssueLine = $Get(^INIssueLine(YM,pidCurDisp,idIssueLine,1)) Set idIssueItem = $$$INIssueLineItem(objIssueLine) If (idIssueItem '= "") { Set ^parrDrugs("h",idIssueItem)=idIssueItem } } Quit GetInteractionMessage(pidCurDisp, &arrDrugs) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Get Interaction Message for Drugs ; ; Params: parrDrugs List of drugs , Count , Rx ; ; Returns: Message ; ; History: ; 2014-07-16 Henrique Dias HEVA-1348: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- New strMsg,idItem1,idItem2,objItem ;,idDiluent,objRx,idPatient Set strMsg = "" Set idItem1 = "" Set i="" do LoadDispenses(pidCurDisp,.arrDrugs) For { Set idItem1 = $Order(^parrDrugs("h",idItem1)) Quit:idItem1="" Set idItem2 = "" For { Set idItem2 = $Order(^parrDrugs("h",idItem2)) Quit:idItem2="" Continue:idItem1=idItem2 Continue:('$Data(arrDrugs("l",idItem1))&&'$Data(arrDrugs("l",idItem2))) Set objItem = $Get(^MEDDrugInteraction(0,idItem1,idItem2,1)) If (objItem '= "") && $$$MEDDrugInteractionActive1(objItem) { Set strMsg = strMsg_$$GetMessage(idItem1,idItem2,objItem, , .pintCont) Set parrDrugs("x",idItem1,idItem2)="" Set parrDrugs("x",idItem2,idItem1)="" } } } Quit strMsg GetMessage(pidItem1,pidItem2,pobjItem1, &parrItems, &pintCont) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Display Interaction Message for Drugs ; ; Params: ; pidItem1,pidItem2,pobjItem1, &parrItems, &pintCont ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; None ; ; History: ; 25-Jul-2012 PPP SR18067: Initialize variable strMsg ; 13-Jun-2012 PPP SR18002: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- New idClinic,idInteraction,idProbablity,strMsg Set idClinic = "" Set idInteraction = "" Set idProbablity = "" Set parrItems(pidItem1,pidItem2) = $Increment(parrItems(pidItem1,pidItem2)) Set strMsg = "" //SR18067 If ($$$MEDDrugInteractionClinicalImportance(pobjItem1) '= "") { Set idClinic = $$GetParamDesc^INPARA("MEDCLIIMP",$$$MEDDrugInteractionClinicalImportance(pobjItem1)) } If ($$$MEDDrugInteractionInteractionImportance(pobjItem1) '= "") { Set idInteraction = $$GetParamDesc^INPARA("MEDCLIIMP",$$$MEDDrugInteractionInteractionImportance(pobjItem1)) } If ($$$MEDDrugInteractionOccuranceProbability(pobjItem1) '= "") { Set idProbablity = $$GetParamDesc^INPARA("MEDPROBABILITY",$$$MEDDrugInteractionOccuranceProbability(pobjItem1)) } If (parrItems(pidItem1,pidItem2) < 2) { Set pintCont = $Increment(pintCont) Set strMsg = "

"_$$^WWWFORMNAME("MEDDrugInteraction")_" #"_pintCont_"

"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","P",1)_": "_"("_pidItem1_") "_$$^INARTNAME(pidItem1)_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","P",2)_": "_"("_pidItem2_") "_$$^INARTNAME(pidItem2)_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",1)_": "_idClinic_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",2)_": "_idInteraction_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",3)_": "_$$$MEDDrugInteractionEarlyInteraction(pobjItem1)_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",4)_": "_idProbablity_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",5)_": "_$$$MEDDrugInteractionEffect(pobjItem1)_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",6)_": "_$$$MEDDrugInteractionMechanism(pobjItem1)_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",7)_": "_$$$MEDDrugInteractionSuggestion(pobjItem1)_"

" } Quit strMsg CheckDrugInteraction(pYKEY,pblnValidOnly=$$$NO,pblnProcess=$$$NO,&pstrMessage,&pintCont) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Check if Interaction Message exist for Drugs called by Drug Interaction Button ; on INDispenseToPatientLine ; ; Params: pYKEY -> KEY ID ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: Boolean ; ; History: ; 2014-07-16 Henrique Dias HEVA-1348: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnExist,idDispense,idLine1,idLine2,objLine1,objLine2,arrGrid,idItem1 new objItem1,idItem2,idDiluent,objItem2,objDispense,idRx,arrDrugs,dtTo Set YQ = $$$YQDisable("MED00417") //Dispense does not contain any Drug Interactions. Set blnExist = $$$NO Set idDispense = $Get(pYKEY) // ID Dispensação/Saída Ex: 11/000057 Set idRx = "" If '$$$NoKey(pYKEY) { $$$GRIDGetContents(.arrGrid,"INDispenseToPatientLine") Set idLine1 = "" For { Set idLine1 = $Order(arrGrid(idDispense,idLine1)) Quit:idLine1="" Set objLine1 = $Get(arrGrid(idDispense,idLine1)) Set idItem1 = $$$INIssueLineItem(objLine1) Set arrDrugs("l",idItem1) = "" } } Set idOrder = "" For i=1:1:2 { Set idOrder = $Order(arrDrugs("l",idOrder)) } Set pstrMessage = $$GetInteractionMessage($Get(idDispense),.arrDrugs) If (pstrMessage '= "") { Set blnExist = $$$YES $$$YQHandler(blnExist) } Quit blnExist DrugInteraction(pidDispense) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Check the Drug Interaction ; ; Params: pidDispense - Dispense ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 2014-07-16 Henrique Dias HEVA-1348: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- New blnInteraction Set blnInteraction = $$CheckDrugInteraction(pidDispense) If (blnInteraction) { //Show messages &js< messageInteractions(0); > } Quit CheckInteraction(YKEY) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Check the Drug Interaction ; ; Params: pidDispense - Dispense ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 2014-07-16 Henrique Dias HEVA-1348: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- New tCheckInteracao, tStatusInteracao Quit:YKEY="" // Verificar se o checkbox "Validar Interações Medicamentosas" está marcado Set tCheckInteracao = $Piece($Get(^VARParametroCliente(YM,YM,1)),"~",83) If (tCheckInteracao '= "") { // Verificar se existem itens com interação medicamentosa Set tStatusInteracao = $$CheckDrugInteraction^VARINDispenseToPatientLine(YKEY) If (tStatusInteracao=1) { &js< messageValid(); > } Else { do Post^VARINDispenseToPatientLine(YKEY) } } Else { do Post^VARINDispenseToPatientLine(YKEY) } Quit BuildMessage(pYKEY) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Check the Drug Interaction ; ; Params: pidDispense - Dispense ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 2014-07-16 Henrique Dias HEVA-1348: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- New strWarning, intSize // Monto a mensagem Set intSize = 120 Set strWarning = "A dispensação de nº: "_pYKEY_" possui itens com interação medicamentosa.

Deseja prosseguir? " // Faço a chamada Javascript $$$JS("messageWarningInteraction('"_strWarning_"','"_intSize_"');") Quit $$$OK Post(pidIssue) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Post adjustment ; ; Called By: Form INDispenseToPatient : Button 1 - Execute OnClick ; ; Returns:Status ; ; History: ; 2014-07-16 Henrique Dias HEVA-1348: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- New strStatus Set strStatus = $$Transaction^COMTransaction("PostTxn^INIssueAuto("""_pidIssue_""")",$$$YES) If $$$ISOK(strStatus) { do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("INDispenseToPatient",pidIssue) } Quit strStatus ShowInteractionMessage(pYKEY="", pblnValidOnly=$$$NO, window=1,pidPrescription="") ;SMSPE-15 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Show Interaction Message for Drugs ; called by Drug Interaction Button on MEDDispenseLine ; ; Params: ; pYKEY : KEY ID ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; Boolean ; ; History: ; 31-Jan-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Use common code ; 07-Aug-2012 PPP SR18067: Updated to check diluents ; 16-Jul-2012 SCR SR18002: Changed to look at all active ; 13-Jun-2012 PPP SR18002.1: Added Diluent Drug Interaction ; 04-Jun-2012 PPP SR18002: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strMsg,intCont set intCont=0 do CheckDrugInteraction(pYKEY, pblnValidOnly,,.strMsg,.intCont) if strMsg'="" do PrepareMessage(strMsg,window,.intCont) quit PrepareMessage(pstrMsg="",pblnWindow=1,pintCont) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Show Interaction Message for Drugs from the Prescription ; ; Params: ; pYKEY : KEY ID ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; Boolean ; ; History: ; 20-Jan-2014 shobby SMSPE-15: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new intLines,intSize if (pblnWindow){ set intLines = $l(pstrMsg,"
")+2 set intSize = intLines * 27 if (intSize > 600){ set intSize = 600 } set pstrMsg = $replace(pstrMsg,"'","`") set pstrMsg = $$$Text($lb("MED00416",pintCont))_pstrMsg //Dispense contains %1 Drug Interaction(s)
do Show^WWWPopupMessage(pstrMsg,,,,"dscPopupDrugInteraction",,,,$$$YES,,600) ;SMSPE-15 } else { write "" write "" write "" write pstrMsg write "
" write "" write "
" } quit
